Detailed Description

This child class of VectorGenerator is used to generate 3D vectors in a box whose basis vectors are parallel with the x,y,z basis vectors.

The box is specified by two points being its opposing corners.

BoxVectorGenerator * BoxVectorGenerator::parsePythonTuple ( PyObject *  args  )  [static]

This method parses a Python tuple and builds a BoxVectorGenerator.

The arguments accepted are two triples of numbers. Args is not a borrowed object so it needs to have its reference count decremented after use.

Parameters:
args Python tuple containing initialisation information.
Returns:
A pointer to the newly created vector generator if successful; NULL, otherwise.
